## Description {#details}

Helper used by class <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mca/instrdesc">InstrDesc</a> to describe how hardware resources are used.

This class describes how many resource units of a specific resource kind (and how many cycles) are &quot;used&quot; by an instruction.

Definition at line 436 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mca/instruction-h">Instruction.h</a>.
